name: MIDNIGHT in the FOREST
description:
This game was developed for a Jam with theme light, the project didn't make for the deadline because I could be there to submit it, however I wanted to publish it.

The player is inside a forest and his/her mission is to find five yellow energy balls that are distributed around the game world. There is an enemy that will try to catch the player and he will remove all the balls from him/her and will kill him/her if the he/she does not have any of them.

There is a sophisticated  system of light to understand:

  • Yellow: to see the environment 
  • Green: to see trace of energy of the balls
  • Blue: to see and catch the energy balls
  • Red: to see the enemy

The yellow light also will show the enemy in the form of a simple floating red sphere, and the red light pointed directly on the enemy will stop his movement.

The only goal of the game is to catch all the balls without getting killed, the player must be able to switch between the different lights and moving through the forest.

Move the character with the arrows or wasd, use the mouse to see around you and use the two mouse buttons to switch between the four types of light.
